issue.title: Unordered container local iterators should be constexpr iterators

discussion.p: The intent of was for all container iterators to be constexpr iterators, but during application of the paper to the working draft it was observed that unordered containers don't say it for their local iterators.
Set status to Tentatively Ready after eight votes in favour during reflector poll.
